name: Stonebot Adventures
description:
Stonebot Adventures is a Sokoban-inspired game where your goal is to reach the flag, and solve any puzzles along the way. However, more elements can be found within the puzzles, like paint splatters, electric tiles, and swappers. The game contains 53 main levels, along with a Tricky level pack containing harder variants of the main levels. That's all there is to it.

Features:

  • 106 total levels with a variety of elements.
  • Undo button with no limit.
  • Cards that allow you to skip levels.
